Pre-Game Insights: South Africa and Bangladesh will face each other in the 22nd match of the T20 World Cup 2022 on Thursday, October 27 at Sydney Cricket Ground.
South Africa's first game against Zimbabwe ended in a rain-affected no result, while Bangladesh defeated the Netherlands in their first match.
Taskin Ahmed was the star for Bangladesh with a four-wicket haul in their match against the Netherlands.
The match prediction suggests South Africa can win against Bangladesh.
Head-to-head statistics show South Africa leading with 7 wins to Bangladesh's 0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcasted on Star Sports and Hotstar.
